head.title: docs: drop last proposer test; add current_state_report.py; smoke test bash guard

todos.text: "text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: Consider direct URL?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: use DirectUrl.equivalent when\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Try to get these passing down from the command?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO tags? scheme?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: In the future, it would be nice if pip supported PEP 691\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME doesn't account for venv linked to global site-packages\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: keep src in cwd for now (it is not a temporary folder)\""
"text": "\"text\": \"from pip._internal.utils.compat import stdlib_pkgs  # TODO: Move definition here.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: this property is relatively costly to compute, memoize it ?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: get project location from second line of egg_link file\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: currently, the resolver uses the default environment to evaluate\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: This needs Python 3.10's improved slots support for dataclasses\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Get range requests to be correctly cached\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: separate this part out from RequirementPreparer when the v1\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: https://github.com/pypa/pip/issues/11943\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: The is_installable_dir test here might not be necessary\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: replace this with slots=True when dropping Python 3.9 support.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: it would be nice to keep track of the source\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: handle space after '\\\\'.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: Is there a better place to create the build_dir? (hg and bzr\""
"text": "\"text\": \"TODO remove this property together with the legacy resolver, since the new\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: need a test for this elif block\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO performance: this means we iterate the dependencies at least twice,\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Supply reason based on force_reinstall and upgrade_strategy.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Check already installed candidate, and use it if the link and\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Are there more cases this needs to return True? Editable?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: handle?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: magic signatures?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: should we warn?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: There is an assumption that the result will be a\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Add some logging here...\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO check k, v for valid values\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO should we eliminate the recursion?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO check whether we need to call `list_hook`\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO is the interaction between `list_hook` and `use_list` ok?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO check whether we need to call hooks\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: The spec doesn't say anything about if the keys should be\""
"text": "\"text\": \"description: _Validator[str | None] = _Validator()  # TODO 2.1: can be in body\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Can we test whether something is contained within a requirement?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Can we normalize the name and extra name?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Need to care about 32-bit PPC for ppc64 through 10.2?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Add Generic type annotations to initialized collections.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"_ResourceStream = Any  # TODO / Incomplete: A readable file-like object\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: 'ZipProvider._extract_resource' is too complex (12)\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: 'Distribution.insert_on' is too complex (13)\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: remove this except clause when python/cpython#103632 is fixed.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Add a deadline?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"highlight ``XXX``, ``TODO``, ``FIXME``, ``BUG`` and ``NOTE``.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"Now recognizes ``FIXME`` by default.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"['XXX', 'TODO', 'FIXME', 'BUG', 'NOTE'])\""
"text": "\"text\": \"TODO: clean up the code here.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# different tokens.  TODO: DelegatingLexer should support this\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Remove this in 3.0.0: see #2811\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: response is the only one\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: This is a little inefficient, it is only used by full justify\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Not sure if we need the SecTrustResultType for anything?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Fix tunnel so it doesn't depend on self.sock state.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Add optional support for socket.gethostbyname checking.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME rethrow compatible exceptions should we ever use this\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: should I do clean shutdown here? Do I have to?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Well, crap.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Update in line with above.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO(t-8ch): Stop inheriting from AssertionError in v2.0.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: Ideally we'd like to include the url in the ReadTimeoutError but\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: Is there a better way to differentiate between SSLErrors?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: Rewrite this method and make it a class with a better structured logic.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# FIXME: Can we do this somehow without accessing private httplib _method?\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: In v2 we can remove this sentinel and metaclass with deprecated options.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Deprecated, remove in v2.0\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: If already given in **kw we use what's given to us\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: For now favor if the Retry implementation sets its own method_whitelist\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Remove this deprecated alias in v2.0\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: Remove this when we break backwards compatibility.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: support for BOM within a stream.\""
"text": "\"text\": \"# TODO: We need to make tab handling rules more sane. A good rule is\""
